class.name: StreamPeerSSL
class.description: SSL Stream peer. This object can be used to connect to SSL servers.

method.name: connect_to_stream
method.description: Connect to a peer using an underlying [StreamPeer] "stream", when "validate_certs" is true, [code]StreamPeerSSL[/code] will validate that the certificate presented by the peer matches the "for_hostname".

method.name: get_status
method.description: Return the status of the connection, one of STATUS_* enum.

method.name: poll
method.description: Poll the connection to check for incoming bytes. Call this right before "get_available_bytes()" for it to work properly.

constants.constant: A status representing a [code]StreamPeerSSL[/code] that is disconnected.
A status representing a [code]StreamPeerSSL[/code] that is connected to a host.
An error status that shows a mismatch in the SSL certificate domain presented by the host and the domain requested for validation.
